info.title: LTV Keyword Extractor
info.description:
This Web Service is a middleware between LinkedTV and KeywordExtractor applications. The REST API [1] is able to load any ASR, SRT, STL or XML+OAI-PMH content, process it, and return a XML result about keywords occurring in some particular video. Only an existed user account within the KeywordExtractor application [2, 3] is required to use this easy API.

[1] LTV Keyword Extractor API - middleware
[2] Keyword extraction tool - Developer Documentation
[3] Keyword extraction tool - User Interface
